network

Class FIFONode<T extends Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Node<T>
      • network.FIFONode<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - A message type.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FIFOSwitch

    public abstract class FIFONode<T extends Message>
extends Node<T>
    A node that uses the FIFO policy when scheduling messages.

    Only implements scheduleMessage(int, Node, Message) and sendOutboundMessages(int).

    Author:
    Bitidork

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FIFONode(FIFOScheduler<T> scheduler)
      Constructs a node with empty input queues and the supplied scheduler.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void scheduleMessage(int time, Node<T> source, T message)
      Schedules message that hopped from source to this node to be an outbound message.
      void sendOutboundMessages(int time)
      Sends a subset of messages scheduled by Node.scheduleMessage(int, Node, Message) out from this node.

      • Methods inherited from class network.Node

        addLink, addLink, getId, getIdleOutputPorts, hashCode, processMessage, transmitToNode, update

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FIFONode

        public FIFONode(FIFOScheduler<T> scheduler)
        Constructs a node with empty input queues and the supplied scheduler.
        Parameters:
        scheduler - The scheduler this switch will use.

    • Method Detail

      • scheduleMessage

        public void scheduleMessage(int time,
                   Node<T> source,
                   T message)
        Description copied from class: Node
        Schedules message that hopped from source to this node to be an outbound message. It should be possible for this message to be sent out from this node on a call to Node.sendOutboundMessages(int).
        Parameters:
        time - The time to schedule the message at.
        source - The node that the message most recently came from.
        message - The message to schedule.
        See Also:
        Node.sendOutboundMessages(int), Node.update(int), Node.processMessage(int, Node, Message)

      • sendOutboundMessages

        public void sendOutboundMessages(int time)
        Description copied from class: Node
        Sends a subset of messages scheduled by Node.scheduleMessage(int, Node, Message) out from this node.

        To transmit a message to a node, use Node.transmitToNode(int, Node, Message).

        Parameters:
        time - The time at which to send messages out from this node.
        See Also:
        Node.scheduleMessage(int, Node, Message), Node.transmitToNode(int, Node, Message), Node.update(int)
